elements.text: You are grocery shopping and see another shopper using a motorized grocery cart. Your mind starts racing as you worry about what kind of assistance you might need one day. You look up as a friend calls your name from further down the aisle, and as you focus on the present, you begin to...

elements.name: Future Assistance_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
